name: Mountain Town Prototype
description: A small mountain town with various establishments and surrounding wilderness

town-square.name: Town Square
town-square.description: The heart of the small mountain town, with a fountain at the center and cobblestone paths leading in all directions.

inn.name: The Cozy Hearth Inn
inn.description: A warm, inviting tavern with the smell of hearty stew and the sound of friendly conversation.

shop.name: General Store
shop.description: Shelves lined with supplies, trinkets, and necessities for travelers and locals alike.

brothel.name: The Velvet Rose
brothel.description: An elegant establishment with red velvet curtains and the soft glow of candlelight.

outskirts.name: Town Outskirts
outskirts.description: The edge of civilization, where well-trodden paths give way to wilderness.

forest.name: Whispering Woods
forest.description: Dense trees create a canopy overhead, with dappled sunlight filtering through the leaves.

forbidden-grotto.name: Forbidden Grotto
forbidden-grotto.description: A mysterious cave entrance hidden among ancient trees, emanating an otherworldly energy.
